location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:345 x 550 mm, on sheet 490 x 675 mm.Materials:printed on paper.

mods.abstract: Map of Cyprus, indicating: coastline, rivers, roads, towns, villages. A note in the bottom left corner of the map states that it was prepared under the direction of Captain George Edward Grover, and lithographed at the Intelligence Branch, Quarter Master General’s Department.
